profileAlternative.name: Samantha N F.
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Account Executive at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
I help companies transform the way they engage with their customers through our technology. I take a consultative approach to understand business objectives and engineering goals/challenges to prescribe the right solution that will provide a strong return on investment.

I have a proven track record of being a top performer in every role I've held because my ability to effectively manage a value-based sales cycle, command a presence amongst decision makers, and genuine curiosity to understand my customers' businesses while perfecting my craft.

I enjoy working in a fast-paced environment that allows me to collaborate with my peers while demanding individual results. I thrive in self-start environments, along a team working together for a joint cause.

positions.title:
Title
Cloud Account Manager
positions.description:
»Top Performing Rep Globally Q1 & Q2 2017
»Responsible for accelerating adoption of MongoDB Atlas.
»Worked with both Mid market & Global 2000 Enterprises.

+83% of MongoDB users surveyed are invested in running in the cloud, with most citing “agility” as their primary driver- Let us help you move faster.
+”As the old commercial goes… ‘Old platform: $60,000. New platform: $6,000. Getting to focus all of my time on development: priceless.'” – Customer of mine

positions.title:
Title
Sales Development Representative
positions.description:
» Achieved 180% Quota
» Outbound, cold prospecting business development role; responsible for collaboration with Enterprise accounts.
» Delivering increased database service availability, accelerated time to market, development of new types of applications to maximize competitive advantage, and lowered TCO compared to Oracle and Microsoft.
» Discovery of client needs and ensuring success of deployments on MongoDB's unique architecture.
» Responsible for collaboration with Solutions Architects and Enterprise Account Executive leaders to partner with clients for project solutions.
» Client-facing Enterprise Team representation in East Coast.

positions.title: Account Manager
positions.description:
» New Logo Creation in Greenfield Territory for TCG
» Responsible for scoping and diagnosing client needs, managing contractors timeline, and leveraging the knowledge and creativity of contractors and clients to generate project solutions.
» Manage small and large project budgets with creative, interactive and marketing contractors from inception through completion.
» Manage client expectations and ensure that delivery meets expectations.
» Client-facing account manager, oversee day-to-day relationships with clients, providing thoughtful and pragmatic leadership.
» Assist candidate sourcing and recruiting efforts.

positions.title: Production Intern
positions.description: NBC Dateline and Rock Center with Brian Williams

given.text: Samantha is an incredibly efficient, thorough, and effective staffing partner. She has helped our marketing agency, Pen & Tell Us, grow by helping us find and manage top-caliber creative talent. She is an asset to our team.

I do not say this lightly, but Samantha Fiorenzo saved me from my unemployment nightmare. I can not say enough about her. She is patient, thoughtful, she listens and understands. She goes out of her way to make sure that your work life is going smoothly and that you are happy where you are placed. If there is an issue she is on it like white on rice. I would recommend her to any and everyone.
…
See more
Samantha is a high energy, fearless, hard working, a light-speed learner and the kindest of people. As cliche as it sounds, she is an asset to any organization !

To anyone lucky enough to hire Sam in the Austin area; you are getting a relentless worker, an exceptional account manager, great recruiter, an amazing teammate, and an even better person. She is fearless and has a drive that you can't teach, you can only admire. Samantha will be a future leader in whatever she chooses to pursue and I wish her only the best.
…
See more

Samantha is the kind of coworker who inspires the team to be the best we can be. She shows up early, leaves late, and is fully present in any given situation. She tackles any obstacles thrown her way and handles them in a matter that is efficient, meaningful, and valuable to the company. At her time at TCG- Samantha successfully acquired Fortune500 companies and marked her territory as a force to be reckoned with in the North Jersey region.
